title: 我的问题如何解决啊
txt_content:
Bad video card drivers!      
      -----------------------      
Minecraft was unable to start because it failed to find an accelerated OpenGL mode.
This can usually be fixed by updating the video card drivers.

--- BEGIN ERROR REPORT 7fe0271 --------
Generated 12-10-24 上午12:00
- Minecraft Version: 1.3.2
- Operating System: Windows XP (x86) version 5.1
- Java Version: 1.7.0_09, Oracle Corporation
- Java VM Version: Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM (mixed mode, sharing), Oracle Corporation
- Memory: 8461512 bytes (8 MB) / 26808320 bytes (25 MB) up to 259522560 bytes (247 MB)
- JVM Flags: 0 total; 
- LWJGL: 2.8.4
- OpenGL: ~ERROR~ NullPointerException: null
- Is Modded: Probably not
- Type: Client
- Texture Pack: ~ERROR~ NullPointerException: null
- Profiler Position: N/A (disabled)[failed to get system properties (java.lang.NullPointerException)]

org.lwjgl.LWJGLException: Pixel format not accelerated
 at org.lwjgl.opengl.WindowsPeerInfo.nChoosePixelFormat(Native Method)
 at org.lwjgl.opengl.WindowsPeerInfo.choosePixelFormat(WindowsPeerInfo.java:52)
 at org.lwjgl.opengl.WindowsDisplay.createWindow(WindowsDisplay.java:228)
 at org.lwjgl.opengl.Display.createWindow(Display.java:303)
 at org.lwjgl.opengl.Display.create(Display.java:845)
 at org.lwjgl.opengl.Display.create(Display.java:754)
 at org.lwjgl.opengl.Display.create(Display.java:736)
 at net.minecraft.client.Minecraft.a(SourceFile:233)
 at net.minecraft.client.Minecraft.run(SourceFile:516)
 at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
--- END ERROR REPORT cf0bb852 ----------
这是我打开游戏他写的东西-,-
----------------------[ 电脑配置概述信息 ]----------------------------
   计算机系统:
         电脑       戴尔 Computer Corporation       DIM4500                         X86 兼容台式电脑
         操作系统   Microsoft Windows XP(32bit/SP3)
         DirectX版本   9.0c (4.09.00.0904)
         IE版本    8.0 (8.0.6001.18702)
   计算机硬件:
         处理器      Intel(R) Pentium(R) 4 CPU 2.00GHz
         主板        英特尔 D845EPT2
         芯片组       Intel i845E Rev.E0
         内存         1GB (INFINEON PC2700 DDR 332MHz)
         硬盘         迈拓 Maxtor 2B020H1 (20GB)
         显卡         NVIDIA GeForce FX 5200
         显示器       三星 SyncMaster(19.1 英寸)
         网络适配器   10/100 PCI Fast Ethernet Based Adapter 
         声卡         SoundMAX Integrated Digital Audio


能玩吗我机子~如果要下东西去哪下给网纸好吗我笨得要死

replies.author: 忘れた事
replies.txt_content: 我也遇见过    我是重新安装后就行的
